messages.subject: Re: Hi, I'm new
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Lilith (and anyone else who has wondered the same thing Lilith asked about)- New members to the list are automatically moderated (this is to avoid fly-by
messages.messageBody:
Hi Lilith (and anyone else who has wondered the same thing Lilith
asked about)- New members to the list are automatically moderated
(this is to avoid fly-by advertisers who like to spam YahooGroups
lists). This means your messages get manually released by one or
another of the list moderators, which can take a few minutes to a
few hours depending on whether any of us are on-line at the time :)

Welcome to the list,

Pam

--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "lilith_pouia"
<lilith_pouia@y...> wrote:
>
>
> Hi, my name is Lilith, and i've been unschooling for two and a half
> years now with my oldest son, six. I'm starting with my younger
son,
> now three.
> Still have a lot of doubts and questions and i'n glad i found this
> group. One thing i'm wondering off the bat is how do you reply to a
> post and get your reply to post instead of going to the person's
> email. I've tried replying to two different posts and i don't see
my
> replys on the message board. I read the post and hit reply, what
am i
> doing wrong? Thanks for any advice, Lilith

messages.subject: Hi, I'm new
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, my name is Lilith, and i ve been unschooling for two and a half years now with my oldest son, six. I m starting with my younger son, now three. Still have
messages.messageBody:
Hi, my name is Lilith, and i've been unschooling for two and a half
years now with my oldest son, six. I'm starting with my younger son,
now three.
Still have a lot of doubts and questions and i'n glad i found this
group. One thing i'm wondering off the bat is how do you reply to a
post and get your reply to post instead of going to the person's
email. I've tried replying to two different posts and i don't see my
replys on the message board. I read the post and hit reply, what am i
doing wrong? Thanks for any advice, Lilith
